Question
========

A report of a math exam shows that the score distribution has has a mean score of 78 and a standard deviation of 10. Define the standardized score (*z* -score) of two students who scored 93 and 63, respectively.

Answerlist
----------

* 1.5 and -1.5
* 10 and -10
* 1.5 and 1.5
* 10 and 10

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 1.5 and -1.5: Correct
* 10 and - 10: Incorrect
* 1.5 and 1.5: Incorrect
* 10 and 10: Incorrect
